Name: CipherShed
Filesystems: Only Windows MBR volumes; no UEFI GPT drives, and dynamic drives discouraged

Name: DiskCryptor
Filesystems: Windows volumes on MBR and UEFI GPT drives, ReFs any FS supported by OS

Name: Scramdisk 4 Linux
Filesystems: ext2, ext3, reiserfs, minix, ntfs, vfat/msdos

Name: TrueCrypt
Filesystems: Only Windows MBR volumes; no UEFI GPT drives, and dynamic drives discouraged

Name: VeraCrypt
Filesystems: Windows on both MBR and UEFI GPT drives; dynamic drives discouraged

Name: CyberSafe Top Secret
Filesystems: Only Windows MBR volumes; no UEFI GPT drives, and dynamic drives discouraged

Name: ZzEnc
Two-factor authentication: In UEFI with removable keys store on USB-flash
